reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains concepts clearly and is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Smith makes the lectures engaging and easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: The course is tough, but Dr. Lee is very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: The lectures are a bit dry, but the material is interesting.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is passionate about the subject and encourages class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is an excellent teacher who makes complex topics simple.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are informative, but the exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson brings the texts to life and encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: The course content is difficult, and Dr. White's explanations can be unclear at times.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is passionate about the environment and makes the class exciting.

reviews.subject: Computer Science I
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is knowledgeable, but the coursework is demanding.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis explains statistical concepts well and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: The lectures are detailed, but Dr. Young's teaching style can be dry.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Adams encourages deep thinking and class participation.

reviews.subject: Biology I
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is enthusiastic about the subject and makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Green is knowledgeable, but the lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Ethics
reviews.review: Dr. King is engaging and makes the material relatable.

reviews.subject: Marketing 101
reviews.review: Prof. Perez is a great teacher who brings real-world examples into the classroom.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: The material is complex, but Dr. Martinez does his best to explain it clearly.

reviews.subject: Public Speaking
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is supportive and helps students build confidence in speaking.
